classes.cCustomNote: One course from each of the following GE areas must be completed: A1, A2, A3, B1, B1, B2, B3, (B4 [lab] must be completed with either B2 or B3), B1-B5 elective, C1, C3, C4, D1, D2, D3, D4, D5, and F. C4, D5, and F should be taken only after Junior standing is reached (90 units). Two (2) courses must be completed from B1. No PHIL class may be taken to satisfy GE C4. Refer to online catalog for GE course selection, United States Cultural Pluralism (USCP) and Graduation Writing Requirement (GWR). USCP requirement can be satisfied by some (but not all) courses within GE categories: C3, C4, D1, D3, D4, D5, or F.
